price: 216. Y si te desobedecen, diles: «No tengo nada que ver con lo que hacéis».
arabic: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِنِّي بَرِيٓءٞ مِّمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fa-in ʿaṣawka faqul innī barīon mimmā taʿmalūna
